intro: A Front-End Engineer and beginner writer
skillSummary: Hi! I'm a Frontend Engineer with a strong background in modern Frontend libraries and frameworks such as React.js, Next.js, Vue.js, and Bootstrap. I specialize in building high-performance web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, and have 3 years of experience in this field.

Currently working as a Frontend Engineer at data.ai, I develop innovative data analysis web reports and handle data integration and functionality testing. My hard-working nature, along with an innovative mindset, helps me tackle complex challenges and come up with fresh solutions.
With a strong work ethic, I am dedicated to ensuring the success of any project or task I undertake. I am always willing to go the extra mile and take pride in delivering exceptional results.

works.title: Frontend Engineer
description: Practiced WCAG standard to continuously improve the accessibility of data.ai's web products
Participated in the development of data.ai Microsoft Excel Add-In to improve customer's experience in viewing and downloading data.ai datasets
Improved stability of data.ai products by working on the migration and deprecation of web page components
Used Next.js, TypeScript, and other technologies to develop innovative data analysis web reports and meanwhile handled the following data integration and functionality testing

Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams including UX and product management to enhance existing products, offering valuable insights and feedback to achieve our shared objectives more efficiently

works.title: H5 Developer
description: Developed a new management tool for CAC Sales representatives by creating the Sales Commission section of the dashboard in Angular and Docker, which allow them to check and manage detailed commission data
Enabled the higher-level Sales representatives to allocate commissions to subordinates online by creating the complete user flow of the commission allocation model with backend developers

works.title: Front End Developer
description: Collaborated with other Front End developers to design, develop and maintain the web pages of Collegiate Independent Study

works.title: Front End Developer
description: Added login authentication features and form validation methods to Corelant's website using React Context and Formrik
Further improved website functionality by implementing the 'Forgot password' function including sending user emails through SMTP services and updating new passwords from the frontend page
Developed highly customized blog page templates by using Strapi the headless CMS to help non-technicians update blogs

works.title: Front End Software Developer
description: Collaborate with other FE engineers to rebuild 3MC's website homepage using Reactjs
Created 3MC's SaaS product “Mizaru” according to WCAG 2.1 standards with constant adjustments based on feedback from target users of the deaf-blind community
Identified critical areas for improvement and implemented changes instantly to improve user experience throughout the development process

works.title: Web Developer
description: Increased GE's website visitors by 10% through improving the UI design with web languages and Elementor
Helped over 20 GE volunteers complete their online training programs by developing GE's own LMS with JavaScript and WordPress extensions

projects.title: YouTubePlaylist Upgrade
projects.description: A web app that upgrade your experience browsing saved videos from your precious playlists.
